summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) witness interview form, used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being asked to provide information voluntarily as part of an OIG investigation. The form includes a waiver section for the witness to sign, acknowledging the voluntary nature of the interview.

keyFacts: This is a voluntary witness interview form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The witness is assured that no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer questions, but any statement provided may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes a waiver section for the witness to sign, indicating their voluntary participation.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is not clearly legible in the provided text.
